    • Constructor Detail

      • GraphicalActorMetadata

        public GraphicalActorMetadata(java.io.InputStream moml)
                       throws InvalidMetadataException
        Constructor. Takes in xml metadata. This should be a moml entity with the kepler additional metadata properties. The entity is parsed and an ActorMetadata object is created with appropriate fields.
        Parameters:
        moml - the xml metadata
        Throws:
        InvalidMetadataException
